definition: to stand firmly/to gain a foothold/to establish oneself
to go steady and strike hard (in fighting)/fig. steadily and surely
to go steady and strike hard (in fighting)/fig. steadily and surely

sentences.english: Ting Wen before the train, he jumped onto the platform.
sentences.chinese: 火車還沒停穩，他就跳上了月臺。

sentences.english: We sat down on the park bench and watched the people as they passed.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐在公園的長凳上，把穩考察着來往的行人。

sentences.english: In each of the areas it operates, TOM Group has secured market leadership.
sentences.chinese: 在各經營的業務領域中，TOM皆穩佔市場領導地位。

sentences.english: Moreover, 6 patients su ered from redislocation, and 23 patients experienced patella instability.
sentences.chinese: 術後6例發生再脫位，23例出現單純髕骨不穩。

sentences.english: A Bocchicchio hostage was gilt - edged insurance.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一個卜啓丘人質就等於最把穩的保證。

sentences.english: The genetic-mechanism of optimal depth and stable points was revealed.
sentences.chinese: 揭示了最佳埋深和穩定點的形成機理。

sentences.english: He is a man of unsteady mind, and acts by planets.
sentences.chinese: 他思想不穩，行爲遊移不定。

sentences.english: He made his shaking arm steady, then touched the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 他把抖動的手臂穩下來，接着扣下扳機。

sentences.english: When the head is stable, sword arm enters water, resumptive below one slowly expiratory process.
sentences.chinese: 頭部穩定時，右臂入水，再開始下一慢慢呼氣的過程。

sentences.english: The voyage is so smooth that we can do some reading on board.
sentences.chinese: 船走得這麼穩，我們真可以在船上讀書了。

sentences.english: He planted his feet firmly on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他在地上雙腳站得很穩。

sentences.english: This way, we can stand more stably.
But, as yet, he was not absolutely sure.
sentences.chinese: 可是，到此時爲止，他還不能絕對拿得穩。

sentences.english: I caught her ankles as she kicked into a handstand.
sentences.chinese: 她倒立踢騰腿時，我抓穩她的腳踝。

sentences.english: Third, to promote the steady growth of foreign trade and structural adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 第三，促進外貿穩增長調結構。

sentences.english: Instabilities of the circulation was not associated with the tubes.
sentences.chinese: 無轉流管原因引起的循環不穩。

definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
